info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the OpenAPI specification for your project.

billingAddressId.description: ID of billing address from user profile

useShippingAsBilling.description: Use shipping address as billing address

billingAddress.description: Billing address (can be the same as shipping address)

notes.description: Additional notes about the status change

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include

hasMore.description: Whether there are more items after this page

limit.description: Number of items in this page

get.description: Retrieve nested schema data to test $ref generation

200.description: Returns nested schema with base schema reference

post.description: Create a new item with extended schema to test .extend() functionality

requestBody.description: Extended schema with base and additional properties

put.description: Update with double extended schema to test deep inheritance

requestBody.description: Double extended schema with multiple levels of inheritance

200.description: Returns the updated double extended schema

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of orders with filtering and sorting options

post.description: Creates a new order from cart

patch.description: Updates the status of an order

delete.description: Cancels an order if it's not already delivered

get.description: Retrieves detailed product information by ID

delete.description: Removes a product from the system

post.description: Uploads PNG or JPG image files with validation and metadata

requestBody.description: Multipart form data containing image file (PNG/JPG, max 5MB), optional description and category

201.description: Returns upload confirmation with file metadata and access URL
